description: A dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool, using the InfluxDB exporter

targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "error_code"::tag, "status"::tag fill(null)

panels.description: need full duration range for correct number
panels.title: Active VUs

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") / 60 FROM "data_sent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") / 60 FROM "data_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT median("value"), mean("value"), percentile("value", 90), percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND "method"::tag = 'POST' GROUP BY "method"::tag, "name"
SELECT median("value"), mean("value"), percentile("value", 90), percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND "method"::tag = 'GET' GROUP BY "name", "method"::tag
SELECT count("value") as Requests, sum("value") as Errors, sum("value")/count("value") as sum_count  FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "method"::tag

title: k6 Load Testing Results
